entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023
